name: @tremho/tap-assert
description: a simple assertion library for using Tap JS the way I like to, leveraging only the tap.ok() method and emitting waypoint messages

scripts.prepublish: npx rimraf build && npm run lint && npm test && npm run doc && echo OKAY
scripts.clean: npx rimraf build ; npx rimraf node_modules ; npm install
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run unitTest
scripts.doc: npm run build && documentation lint build/TapAssert.js --shallow && documentation readme build/TapAssert.js --readme-file ./README.md --section API --shallow --markdown-toc false > /dev/null

author: tremho
